member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonClaimValueTypes
member.summary: Constants for Json Web tokens.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonClaimValueTypes.Json
member.summary: A URI that represents the JSON XML data type.
member.remarks: When mapping json to .Net Claim(s), if the value was not a string (or an enumeration of strings), the ClaimValue will serialized using the current JSON serializer, a property will be added with the .Net type and the ClaimTypeValue will be set to 'JsonClaimValueType'.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonClaimValueTypes.JsonArray
member.summary: A URI that represents the JSON array XML data type.
member.remarks: When mapping json to .Net Claim(s), if the value was not a string (or an enumeration of strings), the ClaimValue will serialized using the current JSON serializer, a property will be added with the .Net type and the ClaimTypeValue will be set to 'JsonClaimValueType'.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonClaimValueTypes.JsonNull
member.summary: A URI that represents the JSON null data type
member.remarks: When mapping json to .Net Claim(s), we use empty string to represent the claim value and set the ClaimValueType to JsonNull

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken
member.summary: A designed for representing a JSON Web Token (JWT).

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of from a string in JWS or JWE Compact serialized format.
member.param: A JSON Web Token that has been serialized in JWS or JWE Compact serialized format.
member.exception: 'jwtEncodedString' is not in JWS or JWE Compact serialization format.
member.remarks:
see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7519 (JWT) see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7515 (JWS) see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7516 (JWE)
The contents of the returned have not been validated, the JSON Web Token is simply decoded. Validation can be accomplished using the validation methods in

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class where the header contains the crypto algorithms applied to the encoded header and payload.
member.param: A string containing JSON which represents the cryptographic operations applied to the JWT and optionally any additional properties of the JWT.
A string containing JSON which represents the claims contained in the JWT. Each claim is a JSON object of the form { Name, Value }.
member.remarks:
see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7519 (JWT) see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7515 (JWS) see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7516 (JWE)
The contents of the returned have not been validated, the JSON Web Token is simply decoded. Validation can be accomplished using the validation methods in

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.AuthenticationTag
member.summary: Gets the AuthenticationTag from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.
member.remarks:
Contains the results of a Authentication Encryption with Associated Data (AEAD). see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7516#section-2
If this JWT is not encrypted with an algorithms that uses an Authentication Tag, an empty string will be returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Ciphertext
member.summary: Gets the Ciphertext representing the encrypted JWT in the original raw data.
member.remarks:
When decrypted using values in the JWE header will contain the plaintext payload. see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7516#section-2
If this JWT is not encrypted, an empty string will be returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.EncodedHeader
member.summary: Gets the EncodedHeader from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.
member.remarks: The original Base64UrlEncoded string of the JWT header.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.EncryptedKey
member.summary: Gets the Encrypted Content Encryption Key.
member.remarks:
For some algorithms this value may be null even though the JWT was encrypted. see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7516#section-2
If not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.EncodedPayload
member.summary: Gets the EncodedPayload from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.
member.remarks: The original Base64UrlEncoded of the JWT payload, for JWE this will an empty string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.EncodedSignature
member.summary: Gets the EncodedSignature from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.
member.remarks: The original Base64UrlEncoded of the JWT signature. If the JWT was not signed or a JWE, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.EncodedToken
member.summary: Gets the original raw data of this instance when it was created.
member.remarks: The original Base64UrlEncoded of the JWT.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.InitializationVector
member.summary: Gets the Initialization Vector used when encrypting the plaintext.
member.remarks:
see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7516#appendix-A.1.4
Some algorithms may not use an Initialization Vector. If not found an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.InnerToken
member.summary: Gets the associated with this instance.
member.remarks:
see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7516#section-2 For encrypted tokens {JWE}, this represents the JWT that was encrypted.
If the JWT is not encrypted, this value will be null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.IsEncrypted
member.summary: Returns true if this JsonWebToken was encrypted a JWE.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.IsSigned
member.summary: Returns true if this JsonWebToken was signed a JWS.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.SecurityKey
member.summary: Not implemented.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.SigningKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the that was used to sign this token.
member.remarks: If the JWT was not signed or validated, this value will be null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Actor
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'actort' claim the payload.
member.remarks: If the 'actort' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Alg
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'alg' claim from the header.
member.remarks:
Identifies the cryptographic algorithm used to encrypt or determine the value of the Content Encryption Key. Applicable to an encrypted JWT {JWE}. see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7516#section-4.1.1
If the 'alg' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Audiences
member.summary: Gets the list of 'aud' claims from the payload.
member.remarks:
Identifies the recipients that the JWT is intended for. see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7519#section-4.1.3
If the 'aud' claim is not found, enumeration will be empty.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Claims
member.summary: Gets a where each claim in the JWT { name, value } is returned as a .
member.remarks: A requires each value to be represented as a string. If the value was not a string, then contains the json type. and to determine the json type.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Cty
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'cty' claim from the header.
member.remarks:
Used by JWS applications to declare the media type[IANA.MediaTypes] of the secured content (the payload). see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7516#section-4.1.12 (JWE) see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7515#section-4.1.10 (JWS)
If the 'cty' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Enc
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'enc' claim from the header.
member.remarks: Identifies the content encryption algorithm used to perform authenticated encryption on the plaintext to produce the ciphertext and the Authentication Tag. see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7516#section-4.1.2

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.GetClaim(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a representing the { key, 'value' } pair corresponding to the provided .
member.remarks:
A requires each value to be represented as a string. If the value was not a string, then contains the json type. and to determine the json type.
If the key has no corresponding value, this method will throw.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.GetHeaderValue``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the 'value' corresponding to key from the JWT header transformed as type 'T'.
member.remarks: The expectation is that the 'value' corresponds to a type are expected in a JWT token. The 5 basic types: number, string, true / false, nil, array (of basic types). This is not a general purpose translation layer for complex types.
member.returns: The value as .
member.exception: if claim is not found or a transformation to cannot be made.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.GetPayloadValue``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the 'value' corresponding to key from the JWT payload transformed as type 'T'.
member.remarks: The expectation is that the 'value' corresponds to a type are expected in a JWT token. The 5 basic types: number, string, true / false, nil, array (of basic types). This is not a general purpose translation layer for complex types.
member.returns: The value as .
member.exception: if claim is not found or a transformation to cannot be made.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Id
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'jti' claim from the payload.
member.remarks:
Provides a unique identifier for the JWT. see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7519#section-4.1.7
If the 'jti' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.IssuedAt
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'iat' claim converted to a from the payload.
member.remarks:
Identifies the time at which the JWT was issued. see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7519#section-4.1.6
If the 'iat' claim is not found, then is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Issuer
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'iss' claim from the payload.
member.remarks:
Identifies the principal that issued the JWT. see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7519#section-4.1.1
If the 'iss' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Kid
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'kid' claim from the header.
member.remarks:
'kid'is a hint indicating which key was used to secure the JWS. see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7515#section-4.1.4 (JWS) see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7516#section-4.1.6 (JWE)
If the 'kid' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Subject
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'sub' claim from the payload.
member.remarks:
see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7519#section-4.1.2 Identifies the principal that is the subject of the JWT.
If the 'sub' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.TryGetClaim(System.String,System.Security.Claims.Claim@)
member.summary: Try to get a representing the { key, 'value' } pair corresponding to the provided . The value is obtained from the Payload.
member.remarks: A requires each value to be represented as a string. If the value was not a string, then contains the json type. and to determine the json type.
member.returns: true if successful, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.TryGetValue``1(System.String,``0@)
member.summary: Tries to get the value
member.remarks: The expectation is that the 'value' corresponds to a type expected in a JWT token.
member.returns: true if successful, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.TryGetHeaderValue``1(System.String,``0@)
member.summary: Tries to get the value corresponding to the provided key from the JWT header { key, 'value' }.
member.remarks: The expectation is that the 'value' corresponds to a type expected in a JWT token. The 5 basic types: number, string, true / false, nil, array (of basic types). This is not a general purpose translation layer for complex types.
member.returns: true if successful, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.TryGetPayloadValue``1(System.String,``0@)
member.summary: Try to get the 'value' corresponding to key from the JWT payload transformed as type 'T'.
member.remarks: The expectation is that the 'value' corresponds to a type are expected in a JWT token. The 5 basic types: number, string, true / false, nil, array (of basic types). This is not a general purpose translation layer for complex types.
member.returns: true if successful, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Typ
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'typ' claim from the header.
member.remarks:
Is used by JWT applications to declare the media type. see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7519#section-5.1
If the 'typ' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.X5t
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'x5t' claim from the header.
member.remarks:
Is the base64url-encoded SHA-1 thumbprint(a.k.a.digest) of the DER encoding of the X.509 certificate used to sign this token. see : https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7515#section-4.1.7
If the 'x5t' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.ValidFrom
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'nbf' claim converted to a from the payload.
member.remarks:
Identifies the time before which the JWT MUST NOT be accepted for processing. see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7519#section-4.1.5
If the 'nbf' claim is not found, then is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.ValidTo
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'exp' claim converted to a from the payload.
member.remarks:
Identifies the expiration time on or after which the JWT MUST NOT be accepted for processing. see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7519#section-4.1.4
If the 'exp' claim is not found, then is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Zip
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'zip' claim from the header.
member.remarks:
The "zip" (compression algorithm) applied to the plaintext before encryption, if any. see: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7516#section-4.1.3
If the 'zip' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebTokenHandler
member.summary: A designed for creating and validating Json Web Tokens. See: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7519 and http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc7515.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebTokenHandler.Base64UrlEncodedUnsignedJWSHeader
member.summary: Gets the Base64Url encoded string representation of the following JWT header: { , }.
member.return: The Base64Url encoded string representation of the unsigned JWT header.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebTokenHandler.TokenType
member.summary: Gets the type of the .

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebTokenHandler.CanReadToken(System.String)
member.summary:
Determines if the string is a well formed Json Web Token (JWT).
See: https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7519
member.param: String that should represent a valid JWT.

returns.para: 'false' if the token is null or whitespace.
'true' if the token is in JSON compact serialization format.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebTokenHandler.CanValidateToken
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates if this handler can validate a .
member.returns: 'true', indicating this instance can validate a .

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebTokenHandler.EncryptToken(System.String,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials)
member.summary: Encrypts a JWS.
member.param: A 'JSON Web Token' (JWT) in JWS Compact Serialization Format.
Defines the security key and algorithm that will be used to encrypt the .
member.exception: if the CryptoProviderFactory being used does not support the (algorithm), pair.
if unable to create a token encryption provider for the (algorithm), pair.
if encryption fails using the (algorithm), pair.
if not using one of the supported content encryption key (CEK) algorithms: 128, 384 or 512 AesCbcHmac (this applies in the case of key wrap only, not direct encryption).

if unable to create a token encryption provider for the (algorithm), pair.
if encryption fails using the (algorithm), pair.
if not using one of the supported content encryption key (CEK) algorithms: 128, 384 or 512 AesCbcHmac (this applies in the case of key wrap only, not direct encryption).

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonClaimSet
member.summary: This class provides an abstraction over the json parser for net461+ using System.Text.Json. will delegate to this class to get values.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonClaimSet.GetValue``1(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: The goal here is return types that are expected in a JWT token. The 5 basic types: number, string, true / false, nil, array (of basic types). This is not a general purpose translation layer for complex types. For that we would need to provide a way to hook a JsonConverter to for complex types.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonClaimSet.TryGetValue``1(System.String,``0@)
member.summary: The return types that are expected in a JWT token. The 5 basic types: number, string, true / false, nil, array (of basic types). This is not a general purpose translation layer for complex types. For that we would need to provide a way to hook a JsonConverter to for complex types.

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters
member.summary: Represents the parameters needed to decrypt a JSON Web Token The JwtSecurityTokenHandler uses this as a helper when decrypting a JwtSecurityToken, the JsonWebTokenHandler sets the JsonWebToken property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.Alg
member.summary: Gets or sets signature algorithm that was used to create the signature.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.AuthenticationTag
member.summary: Gets or sets the AuthenticationTag from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.Ciphertext
member.summary: Gets or sets the Ciphertext from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.DecompressionFunction
member.summary: Gets or sets the function used to attempt decompression with.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.Enc
member.summary: Gets or sets the encryption algorithm (Enc) of the token.

member.summary: Gets the EncodedHeader from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.EncodedToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the EncodedHeader from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.InitializationVector
member.summary: Gets or sets the InitializationVector from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.Keys
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of s to attempt to decrypt with.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.Zip
member.summary: Gets or sets the 'value' of the 'zip' claim.
